resources.string:
"Hi,
My name is Arif.

And I'm a Android App Developer, Android app UI/UX designer and Youtuber."

ToDo Success is a free app that will help you a lot in achieving your goals.
In this app, you have been given a smart Pomodoro and a great to-do list manager in which you can keep a to-do list for days, weeks, and months

App Features
1: Task Complete or not Complete features
2: Task name
3: Task steps
4: Task deadline 
5: View, edit and manage tasks
6: Smart Digital Clock
7: To-Do lists for any purpose & more..

In Pomodoro, you can set the time according to your own and when the time is complete,you will be given a reward.\nIf you will use this application every day then your life will be better and your productivity will increase a lot.
